instruction: Australia Post is the national postal service of Australia, which is headquartered in Melbourne, Victoria. It is a government-owned corporation and operates under the Department of Infrastructure, Transport, Regional Development and Communications. The company's primary business is the distribution of mail and packages, as well as providing other postal and logistics services. Its products include postage stamps, packaging materials, and courier services. Australia Post is a major employer in Melbourne and has a significant presence in the Australian postal and logistics industry.
